description:
Unemployment rate

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
13231 Unemployment statistics based on the ILO concept

Definition:
The unemployment rate is the proportion of unemployed
persons in the economically active population (persons in
employment plus unemployed) in the selected age group.
The sampling frame is the population in households aged 15
to 74 years.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Unemployment rate
